attributes.action: Have a legal public vote on whether all MPs who tried to stop Brexit resign
attributes.background:
The people voted to leave the EU 
The MPs who are elected by the people 
Are choosing to not listen or follow through with the vote by the majority of people .
There for the are not following democracy 

They should either resign or be forced to stand down or face a public election immediately

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that call for people to be given or lose their job, or to resign.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236800
